#!/usr/bin/env python3

import logging

from ncbi_genome_download.config import NgdConfig
from ncbi_genome_download.core import config_download


def main():
    logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO)
    logging.getLogger("ncbi-genome-download").setLevel(logging.WARNING)
    logger = logging.getLogger('example')
    logger.setLevel(logging.DEBUG)
    logger.info("Set up example logger")
    config = NgdConfig.from_kwargs(group=["bacteria"], genus=["coe"], fuzzy_genus=True)
    config_download(config)
    logger.debug("Done")


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
